Name: Folding Edge
About the game: In the game 《Folding Space》, you will pilot a spaceship in a random hexagonal universe and find your way home. But this journey is not safe. Collect cards, upgrade equipment, and recruit new crew members to complete the challenge. If it fails, please try again.Because ,it's a whole new adventure . This is the charm of 'Folding Space'. Creatively, Folding Space is a bit like a combination of《Faster Than Light》and 《Slay the Spire》. The gameplay is so unique, The developer will be addicted in it,even after playing hundreds times. Key Features Randomized Galaxy - Each play-through will feature different enemies, events, and results to your decisions. There is also a secret space that requires special item to enter. Strategic Gameplay - Players need to make difficult choices between using equipment and cards. Multiracial crew - Depending on the deck and equipment, players need to upgrade and train different crew. No Second Chances! - Permadeath means when you die, there's no coming back. The constant threat of defeat adds importance and tension to every action
